com.usp.icmc.libraryController.model

Class TimeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.usp.icmc.libraryController.model.TimeController

  • public class TimeController
extends java.util.Observable
    The TimeController class is meant to have a instance of calendar and do some operations with time and date. It does also extend Observable so it can notify time events to all interested Observers
    See Also:
    Date, Observable, Observer

      • setDate

        public void setDate(java.util.Date date)
        Sets the initial calendar date and start a timer to notify all Observers when the day changes
        Parameters:
        date - the date to be set

        Returns:

      • addTime

        public java.util.Date addTime(java.util.Date date,
                              long time)
        Calculates the time addition to a date
        Parameters:
        date - the base date
        time - the time to be added
        Returns:
